charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES (1)

Knowingly and with intent to defraud effect transactions, with 1 or more access devices issued to another person or persons, to receive payment of any other thing of value during any 1 yr period that aggregate value of which is equal to or greater than $1000, to wit on 3/13/01 Berry charged $2,496.00 on James Wooley's Government issued IMPAC credit card, account number 4716301000118090, throught C and L Toner supplies which is a POS machine used by Christopher Robin Maloney in violation of 8:1029(a)(5) [3:02-m-2777]
